item.description:
My Friday night suddenly opened up and I have two new Strategy games waiting to be opened and played. Endeavor, a strategy game based on 18th Century colonization, will be the showcased game for the night. Since this is a "last minute" posting, I will be limiting the attendance to 4. Time permitting, we may be able to play another game from my collection as well.

 

It will be a bring your own food/beverage event. Send me an email if you need directions.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: "Last Minute" Strategy Game Night in Beverly
